pageContext.claim: “The FBI said Michael Flynn -- a general and a great person -- they said he didn't lie. And Mueller said, ‘Well, maybe he did.’ And now they're all having a big dispute. So I think it's a great thing that the judge is looking into that situation.”
pageContext.analysis: Flynn pleaded guilty to lying to the FBI in December 2017. He repeatedly affirmed that he lied to the FBI during his first sentencing hearing Dec. 18, 2018.
